name: Musicbox
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Musicbox is a web application for managing a songs database.

matches.text: <!-- THE FOLLOWING IS NEEDED FOR THE AUTO-COMPLETE SEARCH BOX -->
<!-- Please dont edit this unless you are advanced coder -->

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<div id='logomain'><div id='logotopmain'><div style='font-weight:bold;font-size:12px;color:#000;padding-top:14px;padding-left:4px'>Welcome to Musicbox Version ([^\s]+) Administration Control Panel<\/div>)
